meta.title: SQL Table Structure to Dao and Mapper
meta.description: Given a table structure, generate the entity and MyBatis's Mapper for the table

openingMessage: Welcome to the SQL table structure to Java entity and MyBatis Plus Mapper generation tool! Just input your MySQL CREATE TABLE statement, and I will help you automatically generate compliant Java entity classes and efficient Mapper interface code to rapidly integrate database access into your Java project.

examples.content:
Please help me convert the following MySQL table structure into Java entity classes and MyBatis Plus Mapper interfaces:

CREATE TABLE product (
  product_id INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  product_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  stock INT DEFAULT 0,
  created_time DATETIME NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (product_id)
);
If the table has nullable fields, how should they be handled in the entity class?

For fields that are nullable in the table, the entity class properties should still use the corresponding wrapper types (such as Integer, BigDecimal, etc.) to support null values. Comments above the properties can indicate that the field allows nulls, aiding developer understanding. MyBatis Plus will automatically map null values during queries; no additional handling is necessary.
